name: Yeet Yacht
description:
Play as Chadington Yeets, the wealthy owner of a luxury yacht. As his boat begins to go down, he reverts back to his primal state and utilizes the ancient family technique of "Yeeting." Yeet as many things off the boat as quickly as possible to avoid imminent death! 

Controls:

WASD / Analog Stick - Movement

Shift / Left Face Button - Run

Space Bar / Bottom Face Button - Jump

F / Right Face Button - Pick Up

Left And Right Mouse Click / Left And Right Trigger - YEET!
